channel.title: Changing Cursor
channel.description: Can you change Your cursor with Java to something else for just the client screen? Post your answers. All i know about this is java.awt.Cursor

item.title: Changing Cursor
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

wrong secrion but good question

this may be useful

[code] // Create a component
Component comp = new Button(“OK”);

// By default, the component's cursor is Cursor.DEFAULT_CURSOR
Cursor cursor = comp.getCursor();

// Change the component's cursor to another shape
comp.setCursor(Cursor.getPredefinedCursor(Cursor.HAND_CURSOR));

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Cursor
item.dc:creator: @syzygy syzygy
item.description:
@syzygy wrote:

Perhaps for a full screen client… but as far as the normal small window clients I don’t think so… try searchin on google about it, cause it could be found in other kinda of programs aswell.
